# Examples

This is the examples directory.

It contains example files sorted by their difficuilty (as a prefix of the file name).

## List of examples

- [01_hello_world.lc](./01_hello_world.lc)  
    Just a hello world.  
    Includes: [Function definiton](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Function call](../language-syntax.md#functions), [String definition](../language-syntax.md#strings)
- [02_is_prime.lc](./02_is_prime.lc)  
    An example of how to check if a number is or isnt prime.  
    Includes: [Function definition](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Function call](../language-syntax.md#functions), [If statement](../language-syntax.md#if-statements), [While loop](../language-syntax.md#while-loops), [Variable definition](../language-syntax.md#variables--types), [Operators](../language-syntax.md#operators), [Number definition](../language-syntax.md#numbers)
- [03_bubble_sort.lc](./03_bubble_sort.lc)  
    An example of how to sort an array using the bubble sort algorithm.  
    Includes: [Function definition](../language-syntax.md#functions), [Function call](../language-syntax.md#functions), [If statement](../language-syntax.md#if-statements), [For loop](../language-syntax.md#for-loops), [List definition](../language-syntax.md#lists), [Variable definition](../language-syntax.md#variables--types), [Operators](../language-syntax.md#operators), [Number definition](../language-syntax.md#numbers)
- [04_fib.lc](./04_fib.lc)  
    An example of how to calculate Fibonacci numbers using recursion, iteration, [binet's formula](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binet%27s_formula) and Lucia's pattern reg.
    Includes: TODO
- [05_simple_repl_calc.lc](./05_simple_repl_calc.lc)  
    An example of a simple REPL calculator.  
    Includes: TODO
- [06_hello_world_lasm.lc](./06_hello_world_lasm.lc)  
    An example of how to use inline Lucia Assembly (LASM) to print "Hello, World!".  
    Includes: TODO
- [07_tic_tac_toe.lc](./07_tic_tac_toe.lc)  
    An example of a Tic Tac Toe game using `styledprint`
    Includes: TODO
- [08_rule110.lc](./08_rule110.lc)  
    An example of a [Rule 110 cellular automaton](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rule_110) implementation using bitwise rolling state.
    Includes: TODO
- [09_game_of_life.lc](./09_game_of_life.lc)  
    An example of [Conway's Game of Life](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway%27s_Game_of_Life) implementation.
    Includes: TODO
- [10_bouncing_square_raylib.lc](./10_bouncing_square_raylib.lc)  
    An example of a bouncing square using the [Raylib](https://www.raylib.com/) bindings.
    Includes: TODO
- [11_quine.lc](./11_quine.lc)  
    An example of a [quine](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quine_(computing)) (a program that prints its own source code).
    Includes: TODO
- [12_custom_lang.lc](./12_custom_lang.lc)  
    An example of a simple custom language compiler written in Lucia.
    Includes: TODO
